title: This War Of Mine (Latest With 1.3.2 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of This war of mine. All bonus content is included like the soundtrack. Hope you enjoy and please help seed.

This War of Mine Changelog for version 1.3.2

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Scenario Editor in which you can write your own stories of civilians in war. Pick up members of the group, length of the conflict, weather conditions and more Ã¢â‚¬â€œ itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all up to you! 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Character Editor where you can shape civilians, their look, skills, biographies and then play with them in the game. You can even add your photo and be a part of the story. 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Two new locations: Old Town and Looted Gas Station. Of course they can be included in your scenario! 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ Two new music tracks, designed for the night missions! 


Additionally, here's a quick guide on how to add own photos to the character editor: 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ only format ----> .jpg 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ due to auto-adjusting, we recommend square resolution, for example 500x500 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ place a jpg photo in Portraits folder in the game's main folder, which usually is here: C:Usersyour user nameDocumentsThis War of Mine 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½ restart the game after uploading photo to make the photo available in the editor
